assignments.description: Set Assigned Marketing Unit to the correct value based on Lead Country
assignments.name: Assigned_Marketing_Unit
assignments.label: Assigned Marketing Unit

assignments.description: Based on the DUNS Number map the Lead to an existing Account.
assignments.name: Set_Existing_Account
assignments.label: Set Existing Account

decisions.description: Did the DUNS Number Account lookup find anything? If it did then link the Lead to the Existing Account. Otherwise skip.
decisions.name: Account_Found_DUNS_Decision
decisions.label: Account Found?

decisions.description: If the Existing Account field is populated then set the Company Name to align with the Existing Account Name if it doesn't already align.
decisions.name: Company_Update_Decision_Existing_Account
decisions.label: Company Name Update Required? (Existing Account)

decisions.description: If Lead is created by External Telemarketing User then automatically set Secondary Source = Telemarketing External
decisions.name: Created_by_External_Telemarketing_Decision
decisions.label: Created By External Telemarketing?

decisions.description: If created by Pardot then set Currency based on Country. Otherwise skip.
decisions.name: Created_By_Pardot
decisions.label: Created By Pardot?

decisions.description: If the DUNS Number is populated but the Existing Account lookup is blank or the DUNS Number does not match the Account's DUNS Number check Account Database to see if account exists for matching to Existing Account. Otherwise skip.
decisions.name: DUNS_Link_to_Existing_Account
decisions.label: DUNS Link to Existing Account?

decisions.description: Do the Corporate Type/Business Unit/Region etc values map the Owner's fields? Is an Update required? Only update where the record is owned by a User (not Queue - Owner ID starts with 005) and not owned by B2BMA Integration (Pardot) user.
decisions.name: Key_Owner_Field_Update_Required
decisions.label: Key Owner Field Update Required?

rules.name: Yes_Update_Key_Fields
rules.conditionLogic: 6 AND 7 AND (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 8)
rules.label: Yes - Update Key Fields

decisions.description: This sets the Assigned Marketing Unit on the Lead so it can map to Account Enagagement if needed
decisions.name: Update_Marketing_Unit_Decision
decisions.label: Update Marketing Unit?

formulas.description: Formula to convert Existing Account Name into Proper Case (unless it's all Upper Case already)
formulas.name: f_ExistingAccount_CompanyName_ProperCase
formulas.expression:
IF( UPPER({!$Record.Existing_Account__r.Name}) = {!$Record.Existing_Account__r.Name}, {!$Record.Existing_Account__r.Name}, INITCAP({!$Record.Existing_Account__r.Name}) )
/* If Existing Account Name is all upper case then leave name as is. Otherwise perform INITCAP function to make name Proper Case */

formulas.name: f_marketingUnit
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.Country}, 'United Kingdom','OCS - UK & IRE', 'Ireland', 'OCS - UK & IRE', 'Bangladesh', 'OCS - APAC', 'India', 'OCS - APAC', 'Indonesia', 'OCS - APAC', 'Malaysia', 'OCS - APAC', 'Philippines', 'OCS - APAC', 'Qatar', 'OCS - APAC', 'Saudi Arabia', 'OCS - APAC', 'Singapore', 'OCS - APAC', 'United Arab Emirates', 'OCS - APAC', 'Vietnam', 'OCS - APAC', 'Australia', 'OCS - ANZ', 'New Zealand', 'OCS - ANZ', 'Thailand', 'PCS', 'Cambodia', 'PCS', '')

recordLookups.description: Using the Lead DUNS Number lookup the Account with the matching DUNS Number.
recordLookups.name: Get_Accounts_from_DUNS
recordLookups.label: Get Accounts from DUNS

variables.description: Stores the country value from the Lead record
variables.name: Country

variables.description: This stores the Lead record ID
variables.name: LeadId
